document.masterDocTitle: A catalogue of the species of Mesostigmata (Arachnida, Acari, Parasitiformes) recorded from Ireland including information on their geographical distribution and habitats

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A catalogue of the species of Mesostigmata (Arachnida, Acari, Parasitiformes) recorded from Ireland including information on their geographical distribution and habitats

subSubSection.paragraph: • In : Abhandlungen Naturwissenschaftlichen Verein zu Bremen , 32: 356.

( Evans, 1958 ; Curry, 1969a , b , 1971 , 1976a ; Ganley, 1976 ; Curry & Ganley, 1977 ; Skorupski & Luxton, 1998 ).

Irish Records :
Sphagnum ( Halbert, 1915 )
; under rotten wood ( Halbert, 1923 ); pasture ( Curry, 1969a , b , 1971 , 1976a ; Ganley, 1976 ; Curry & Ganley, 1977 ) dune, pasture,
Iris
bog and bracken bed at seashore ( Purvis, 1982 ); grass on cliff, under bracken and moss, and in saltmarsh (Bolger, in press); pasture on peat ( Whelan, 1976 ); soil under Norway spruce ( Heneghan, 1994; unpublished data ); fungal sporocarp ( O’Connell, 1994 ; unpublished data); moss on soil surface and soil under Sitka spruce ( Arroyo & Bolger, 2007 ); pasture ( Piotrowska, 2009 ).
Counties: Cork, Dublin, Galway, Kildare, Kilkenny, Laois, Mayo, Wexford, Wicklow .

Cusack et al ., 1975
); bracken bed at seashore ( Purvis, 1982 ); fungal sporocarp ( O’Connell, 1994 ; unpublished data); small mammal nests (unpublished data).
